alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:57PM PST until January 04 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 1 AM PST THURSDAY FOR THE TAHOE BASIN ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations 2 to 8 inches for the Tahoe Basin and eastern Alpine County above 7000 feet, with localized heavier amounts up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph along the Sierra crest and up to 30 mph in the Basin. Wave heights on Lake Tahoe 1 to 3 feet. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...From 10 PM Tuesday to 1 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes, especially over Sierra passes. Rough waters Tuesday afternoon into Wednesday afternoon for Lake Tahoe.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
